ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:0.2_0: The monks’ rules and their analysis
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:0.3_0: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:0.5_0: 30. The training rule on sitting in private
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:1.1_0: At one time when the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:1.2_0: At that time Venerable Udāyī’s former wife had become a nun.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:1.3_0: She often went to see Udāyī, and he often went to see her.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:1.4_0: And on one occasion Udāyī was seated in private alone with that nun.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:1.5_0: The monks of few desires complained and criticized her,
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:1.6_0: “How can Venerable Udāyī sit in private alone with a nun?” ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:1.7_0: “Is it true, Udāyī, that you did this?”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:1.10_0: “... Foolish man, how can you sit in private alone with a nun?
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:1.11_0: Foolish man, this won’t give rise to confidence in those without it ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:1.12_0: the Buddha said, “And so, monks, this training rule should be recited like this:
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:1.13.1_0: ‘If a monk sits in private alone with a nun, he commits an offense entailing confession.’”
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.1.2_0: and you have the same kind of perception ...
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.1.4_0: ... The monks who have been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of monk is meant in this case.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.1.8_0: The Buddha then sat down together.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.1.10_0: just the monk and the nun.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.1.14_0: he is not able to make a heap or a shaking, or a wking on his head.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.1.16_0: it is not possible to learn.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.1.18_0: if the monk sits down or lies down next to a seated nun, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.1.19_0: If a nun sits down or lies down next to the seated monk, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.1.20_0: If both have him seated together, they commit an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.2.1_0: If it is private, and he perceives it as private, and he sits down alone with a nun, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.2.2_0: If it is private, but he is unsure of it, and he sits down alone with a nun, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.2.3_0: If it is private, but he perceives it as not private, and he sits down alone with a nun, he commits an offense entailing confession.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.2.4_0: If it is not private, but he perceives it as private, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.2.5_0: If it is not private, but he is unsure of it, he commits an offense of wrong conduct.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.2.6_0: If it is not private, and he perceives it as not private, there is no offense.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.3.2_0: if he has a companion who understands;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.3.3_0: if he sits when the seat is not standing;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.3.4_0: if he is not seeking privacy;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.3.5_0: if he sits down on the seat;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.3.8_0: The tenth rule, the training rule on sitting in private, is finished.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.3.9_0: The third sub-chapter on the instruction is finished.
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.3.12_0: Dwelling place, worldly gain, and by giving;
ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc30:2.3.13_0: He sews, a road, a boat, should eat,
